entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
